title: Haunted Essence
description: Aurora Night is an orphaned teenager who has recently moved to Edinburgh to start a new life. There she meets the mysterious William Wolf, from whom she learns of the existence of Mystic Haven, an ancient magical world that exists alongside the human one. As Aurora becomes embroiled in a conflict between the Shadow Walkers and Queen Agathe, danger follows her every step. Vampires and other creatures she thought only existed in the realms of fairy tales and nightmares, relentlessly hunt her. Aurora soon finds solace with her newfound friends, Veronica, Garnet and Kan, but discovers they are not all they seem... but neither is sheâ€¦
author: L.A.  Brown
